item.title: Getting started with Apache Spark and Scala on Windows
item.description: Introduction This tutorial is intended for people who really need to run Apache Spark on windows. Usually it would be better to run it in a Linux VM or on Docker. There are a few things that cause problems with Spark on windows. But using this way of installation I managed to minimize the impact. Getting the needed files First, download the spark-1.6.0-bin-hadoop2.6.tgz file from the Apache Spark Downloads website. You should also install a program to open it, for example 7zip.
